com.github.nosan.embedded.cassandra.testng

Class AbstractCassandraTestNG

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.nosan.embedded.cassandra.Cassandra
      • com.github.nosan.embedded.cassandra.testng.AbstractCassandraTestNG

  • public abstract class AbstractCassandraTestNG
extends Cassandra
    Abstract Class for running an Embedded Cassandra. This class provides two new methods startCassandra() and stopCassandra(). Cassandra will be started on the random ports. 
     public class CassandraTests extends AbstractCassandraTestNG {
        @BeforeMethod
        public void setUp() throws Exception {
                // before actions
    }
        @AfterMethod
        public void tearDown() throws Exception {
                // after actions
    }
        @Test
        public void test() {
        // test me...
    }
 }
 }
    Author:
    Dmytro Nosan
    See Also:
    RuntimeConfigBuilder, ExecutableConfigBuilder, Cassandra
